name: Elemental Shape
summary: You understand the fundamental elements of nature such that you can imbue them into your body.
description:
You understand the fundamental elements of nature such that you can imbue them into your body and manifest as a living embodiment of those elements. Add the forms in elemental form to your wild shape list. Whenever youâ€™re polymorphed into another form using wild shape, you gain resistance 5 to fire.Elemental Shape Leads To...
